name: CatholicPrayers
0:
”Alexa, ask Catholic Prayers to pray”
”Alexa, ask Catholic Prayers for Hail Mary”
”Alexa, ask Catholic Prayers to remind me to pray”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have your Alexa say a prayer for you anytime you like. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.

Have Alexa remind you to do a prayer based on the day and time of your request.

Expand your experience with Catholic Prayers with the Premium Subscription. It will unlock more prayers for you to listen to and lets you listen to all of the prayers from Father David, a human male voice, and Sister Angie, a human female voice.

You can also unlock 5 additional prayers by purchasing a Prayers Pack instead.

An introduction video that provides an overview of this skill and how to make the most out of it. The video can only be viewed on Alexa screen devices like Echo Show and Fire TV.

NOTE: For Fire TV users, to open the skill you must say "Alexa, open Catholic Prayers skill." Otherwise, it will give you the Catholic Channel app.

List of Prayers: 

The Sign of the Cross
Hail Mary
Our Father/The Lord's Prayer
Glory Be
The Rosary (Abridged) 
The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy
The Apostle's Creed 
Hail Holy Queen
Anima Christi/Soul of Christ
Memorare
The Angelus
Saint Michael Prayer
Act of Contrition
Miraculous Medal Prayer
Morning Offering
Guardian Angel Prayer
Grace Before Meals
Grace After Meals
The Nicene Creed
Pray to Saint Joseph
Serenity Prayer
Act of Faith
Act of Love
Act of Hope 
The Fatima Prayer
Hail Mary of Gold
Pardon Prayer
Angel's Prayer
The Miracle Prayer to St. Anthony of Padua
The Magnificat
Hail, Joseph
Pope Benedict XVI's Prayer for Vocation
Prayer of St. Francis of Assisi
Litany of Mary
Prayer to St. Christopher
Prayer of St. Dominic
Prayer of St. Thomas Aquinas
Prayer of St. Benedict

"""PREMIUM CONTENT"""

The Rosary (Premium Subscription or through a one-time purchase under the same name)

Premium Subscription (Only):

Easter Prayer
Thanksgiving Prayer
The Divine Praises
Laudes Divinae (The Divine Praises in Latin)

Premium Subscription (Also included in Prayers Pack One):

Acceptance of God's Will
Act of Dedication to the Blessed Virgin
Christ
Prayer After Confession
Prayer After Meditation

Premium Subscription (Also included in Prayers Pack Two):

Three O'Clock Prayer to the Divine Mercy
Evening Prayer
Night Prayer
Prayer of Surrender
Prayer for Saint Joseph's Intercession

Premium Subscription (Also included in Prayers Pack Three):

Praise God
Shout with Joy
King David's Prayer
I Confess
Lamb of God

Premium Subscription (Also included in Latin Prayers Pack One):

Signum Crucis (The Sign of the Cross in Latin)
Oratio Dominica (Our Father/The Lord's Prayer in Latin)
Ave Maria (Hail Mary in Latin)
Doxologia Minor (Glory Be in Latin)
Oratio Fatimae (The Fatima Prayer in Latin)

Premium Subscription (Also included in Latin Prayers Pack Two):

Symboloum Apostolorum (The Apostle's Creed)
Salve Regina (Hail Holy Queen in Latin)
Gratia Ante Cibum (Grace Before Meals in Latin)
Gratia Post Cibum (Grace After Meals in Latin)
Symbolum Nicaenum (The Nicene Creed in Latin)

Premium Subscription (Also included in Latin Prayers Pack Two):

Sancte Michael Archangele (Saint Michael Prayer in Latin)
Actus Contritionis (Act of Contrition in Latin)
Anima Christi in Latin
Confiteor (I Confess in Latin)
Agnus Dei (Lamb of God in Latin)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
